question:
You are having a party and want to invite your friend from a different city.
Write letter to your friend. In your letter:
—Describe why are you having a party
—Give directions on how to get to the venue
—suggest how you can accommodate him/her
Write at least 150 words. You do not need to write any addresses
text: I hope you are well.Everything is fine with me. My reason for writing this letter is to invite you to my party to celebrate my new job. It will be like a goodbye party.

As you know I used to work from Akbank for 7 years. although I was glad to be there working abroad was my first target ever. Last month I took an appropriate job offer from the English Bank in London . After several ,interviews they decided to hire me as the marketing manager. I have started as early as I can because the former manager left the job yesterday.
My party would be an opportunity to make you all farewells. Maybe I couldn't have a chance to fly back here often. Slo I desire to meet with my close friends sincerely.

I will be happy if you could attend.The party will be held on next Saturday at 7 o'clock. When you fly here I will pick you up from the airport and you can, of course, stay at my house for 2 or 3 days. I am waiting for your reply.
